thread.title: T.I. talks new music, departure from Columbia Records
thread.title_full: T.I. talks new music, departure from Columbia Records

title: T.I. talks new music, departure from Columbia Records
text:
> Entertainment T.I. talks new music, departure from Columbia Records FILE - In this Nov. 1, 2014, file photo, rapper T.I. performs before the start of an NBA basketball game between the Indiana Pacers and the Atlanta Hawks in Atlanta. T.I. has changed his stage name to his childhood name of Tip, and with his new EP "Da' Nic," he's gone independent, breaking away from a label for the first time. (AP Photo/David Goldman, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
